Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり、<Veigue>に話したほうが いいんじゃないかな……
Entry.EnglishText: I still think you should've told <Veigue> about it...
He should probably know why you were kicked out of the army...

Entry.JapaneseText: いや……そのうち話す機会もある。 その時でいい……
Entry.EnglishText: No, there will be other opportunities to discuss it with him. I can wait until then...

Entry.JapaneseText: ゴメン……<Eugene>にとっては つらいコトなのに、ボク……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sorry, <Eugene>... I know this is painful for you...
